#include <stdio.h>
#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int d = 1;
    while(d!=0)
    {
        int a,b,c;
        cin>>a>>b>>c;
        if (a == 0 && b == 0&& c == 0)
        {
            d = 0;
            continue;
        }
        else
        {
            if ( 2*b == a+c)
            {
                int d = c + b -a;
                printf("AP %d\n", d);
            }
            else
            {
                int d = c*b/a;
                printf("GP %d\n", d);
            }

        }
    }

    return 0;
}
